Formula One - Playlist (Youtube) Playlist filled with great Formula 1-3 videos that have caught my eye.
PURE SOUND F1 ENGINE V8 RENAULT - End of an era (2006-2013) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LXMJCZowwwA 147 Grand-Prix, 60 Wins, 5 Constructor's Title: this is the ranking of the Renault V8 engines, from 2006 to 2013.
Fernando Alonso Drives Title-Winning Renault R25 | 2020 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L96tYRRF1qI Jump onboard for a very special lap of Yas Marina as Fernando Alonso takes his title-winning Renault R25 for a spin, 15 years on...
Sebastian Vettel - 9 F1 Wins In A Row https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CO4s2NjBwcE Tribute to the greatest win streak achieved by an individual in Formula 1 History. Sebastian Vettel in the best machine of the V8 era, the RB9, meant Total Domination.
Vettel's unique technique https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRGoKj9xoZA Anthony Davidson talks about Vettel's driving style and tricks that led to an unbeatable dominance in 2013.
Charles Leclerc's Sprint Race Masterclass | Formula 2 Bahrain 2017 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bh2wAbEJ7c4 Starts sixth. Gets up to first. Pits for tyres. Drops to P14. Comes back to win. Take a look at the performance that confirmed Charles Leclerc as a genuine superstar, when he took his first victory in the 2017 FIA Formula 2 Season.
Great Comebacks - Lewis Hamilton, 2006 GP2 Turkey Istanbul https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lseNan1ODY8 In Istanbul Lewis Hamilton recovered from a spin that left him in eighteenth place to take second position in the final corners. Commentators: Martin Haven and Gareth Rees.
Lewis Hamilton's Incredible Charge In F1 Sprint! | 2021 Brazilian Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jPGnz-_G-Go Ride onboard with Mercedes' Lewis Hamilton for his incredible charge through the Sprint field after starting in P20!
Lewis Hamilton Overtakes EVERYONE! | 2021 Sao Paulo Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z_LmiQlT9oE Happy Birthday, Sir Lewis! As the seven-time champ turns 37, look back on what was surely the race weekend performance of the season in 2021. From last place at the start of Sprint, to winning the Grand Prix, enjoy all 24 overtakes, right here.
All 92 of Lewis Hamilton's Formula 1 Wins So Far https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YU-d7fVgGtY From win No.1 in 2007 to his record-breaking 92nd in Portugal in 2020, enjoy all the best bits from every Lewis Hamilton F1 victory - so far!
Verstappen's Amazing Save in Brazil | F1 is...Heart-in-Mouth https://youtube.com/watch?v=wQCeQKQ7_vI Max Verstappen keeps his cool after sliding in the wet at the 2016 Brazilian Grand Prix.
Kimi Raikkonen's Suspension Failure - NÃ¼rburgring 2005 https://youtube.com/watch?v=Uw-USwauS9s Kimi had survived 20 laps driving on a heavily flat spotted tyre, but his luck ran out on the last lap. The vibration caused from the flat spotted tyre caused a catastrophic failure of the suspension. This handed victory to his championship rival Fernando Alonso.
Top 10 Moments of Lewis Hamilton Brilliance https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=we4VBW99LoU He's got more wins and more poles than any driver in history. He's a seven-time champion, and the first ever active racing knight in Formula 1. As Sir Lewis Hamilton celebrates his 36th birthday, take a look back at 10 of Lewis Hamilton's most impressive moments in F1!
Top 10 Moments of Sebastian Vettel Brilliance https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XkKFNIrX8yc He's a motorsport great who's always had a champion's mindset. Relive some of the German driver's finest moments on a racetrack.
Top 10 Moments of Jenson Button Brilliance https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m2mV9HJmTpQ World Champion, huge personality, and all-round F1 legend. Jenson Button had some amazing moments during his 17 seasons of service in F1... let's take a look at the best of the best!
Top 10 Moments of Kimi Raikkonen Brilliance https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2GJ9udIoGh8 21 race wins, one world title, millions of fans - and countless brilliant moments in the F1 career of Kimi Raikkonen. Here are ten of the very best...
Top 10 Moments of Fernando Alonso Brilliance https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gcx1bcSfPlw Two world championships, 32 race wins and 97 podiums - this is Fernando Alonso at his very best!
Fernando Alonso's Greatest Renault Moments https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=icRDb5mV2SA Fernando Alonso is set to return to F1 with Renault next season. Take a look back at ten of his greatest moments with the team, including his first podium at the 2003 Malaysian Grand Prix Prix and his battles with Michael Schumacher.
Top 10 Moments of Max Verstappen Magic in F1 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B4pF4bMwYYI He's just been re-signed at Red Bull until the end of 2023 - giving us another four years of Max doing what he does best! Join us as we take a look back at some of his most memorable moments so far...
George Russell's Path to Glory | 2018 FIA Formula 2 Championship https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v-JrFx0dly8 With 24 races, 11 podiums, and seven wins to his name, George Russell carved a lasting impression into Formula 2. Re-live the ebbs and flows of a championship-winning year in which he equalled the record for most wins in a Formula 2 season, in his rookie year...
Top 10 Moments Of Nico Rosberg Brilliance https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WJqx-ZRtP7c 2016 world champion Nico Rosberg provided us with plenty of memorable F1 moments - here are ten of his very best.
Top 10 Unbelievable Saves In F1 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jQ-EKi2HhcE What would you do if your multi-million dollar F1 car was heading towards the barriers at high speed? Most of us wouldn't produce a stylish spin to avoid the impending contact, but some of these Formula 1 drivers did just that...
Hamilton vs Verstappen: Title Fight Finale | 2021 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yN7tTNecfJo One last dance. It's winner takes all this weekend in Abu Dhabi as either Lewis Hamilton or Max Verstappen will be crowned World Champion!
Lovely Overtake from Verstappen on Rosberg at Brazil 2016! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XZh2b_FiQiQ
George Russell and Lando Norris Duel at Monza | Formula 2 Italy 2018 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0hVmgbcktGY Two young Brits at the top of the Formula 2 championship going wheel-to-wheel, at one of the fastest tracks in the world. The future certainly looks bright...
F1 2013 - Malaysian GP - Vettel vs Webber - Vettel Onboard https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NNKfko1UJw8
Alonso And Hamilton's Epic Battle | 2013 Canadian Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S3kbxjBAYmM Onboard with Fernando Alonso as he stalks former team mate Lewis Hamilton in Montreal in 2013... and a special game of cat and mouse at the 49s mark...
Alonso's Lightning First Lap | 2012 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=90unbkXQna8 Onboard for a lightning first lap around the Yas Marina Circuit with Fernando Alonso in 2012
Schumacher and Hamilton's Epic Monza Battle | 2011 Italian Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=14Nk0Nze60E Two of F1's greats going wheel-to-wheel around the legendary Monza circuit.
Vettel Battles Alonso At Monza | 2011 Italian Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6gAjhHaT0i4 Onborad with Sebastian Vettel as he takes to the grass in a battle with Fernando Alonso at Monza in 2011...
Schumacher Squeezes Barrichello | 2010 Hungarian Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6AzpYilkKrA Rubens Barrichello makes his feelings clear over team radio after a hair-raising moment at the Hungaroring.
Lewis Hamilton vs Kimi Raikkonen - Spa Francorchamps 2008 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7njqB0G0-aE
Fernando Alonso VS Michael Schumacher - 2005 Japanese GP https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vg_Tpq-gdyY Alonso overtakes Schumacher at Suzuka.
Top 10 Lewis Hamilton Pole Position Laps https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9dTNzPk13ys He made it to a brilliant 100 pole positions - enjoy 10 of Lewis Hamilton's best pole laps from the last 14 years.
2019 Monaco Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton's Pole Lap | Pirelli https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ej8n56fkgWY Watch Lewis Hamilton's stunning lap around the streets of Monaco - giving his 2nd pole of 2019, and 2nd at Monaco.
Michael Schumacher Takes Final "Pole Position" | 2012 Monaco Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RhemGJgwdpM A penalty dropped him to a P6 start on race day - but that didn't stop Michael Schumacher producing one last bit of Monaco magic in his final F1 season, clocking the fastest time during Qualifying in the principality.
F1 2013 R19 Brazil - Sebastian Vettel Onboard Pole Lap https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VkLA_feN0c8
F1 Korea 2013 - Sebastian Vettel Pole Lap Onboard https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I5eUYtacGWE Ride onboard with the Red Bull-Renault of Sebastian Vettel as he storms to pole position for a blistering lap during qualifying for the 2013 Korean Grand Prix at the Korean International Circuit.
The day Sebastian Vettel only needs ONE lap to take pole position : SAVAGE ! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KjzWynz4hMI During the Q3 of the 2013 Singapore GP, Sebastian Vettel makes a phenomenal lap, putting his nearest rival at 6 tenths of a second ! He then returns to the pit definitively, convinced he won't be beaten. During the week-end, Seb took pole position, led every lap, scored the fastest lap, and won by more than 32 seconds; his third Grand Slam in F1. Legend.
Vettel Lights up the Singapore Streets | 2012 Singapore Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rs1Wk5inqUM Sebastian Vettel sported a very special LED helmet during the 2012 Singapore Grand Prix, and recorded a crucial win in his championship challenge Jump onboard with the German, and listen in on his final lap conversations with the pit wall.
F1 2012 Monza Q3 - L Hamilton Pole Lap 1:24.010 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IghJa0iQFwM
F1 2011 Singapore Q3 - S Vettel Pole Lap 1:44.381 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3gHhSGE7y8Q
Sebastian Vettel Pole Lap 2011 Turkey GP https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=72hrrjUCv0k
F1 Monza 2008 - Sebastian Vettel Onboard https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xpusI05oeJM Ride onboard with the Toro Rosso-Ferrari of Sebastian Vettel during practice for the 2008 Italian Grand Prix at the Autodromo Nazionale Monza Circuit.
Lewis Hamilton Onboard Pole Position Lap - Spa 2008 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JFP6Bzlk5Z8
2016 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix Race Highlights: Director's Cut https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WUfUm6kKsJw Nico Rosberg clinches the world championship at a dramatic final race of the 2016 F1 season...
2012 Brazilian Grand Prix: Race Highlights | Presented by Pirelli https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fG-XaGUW1Lc Two legendary drivers, one championship on the line. Re-live the epic climax to the 2012 Formula 1 World Championship in Sao Paulo, Brazil.
Sebastian Vettel's Championship Charge | 2012 Brazilian Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=98h_qLwMJHg Championship charges don't get much more dramatic than this. From the front, to the back, to an unforgettable third world title - here's how Seb got it done back in 2012.
2011 Canadian Grand Prix: Race Highlights https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BL2cPQ5L4Qw Relive the best moments from an epic race as Jenson Button triumphed against the odds at Montreal.
RADIO REWIND! 2011 Canadian Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YjyMF0i-_1k One of the most memorable races in F1 history - as you've never heard it before!
RADIO REWIND! 2010 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OscqgBj1HCw A nail biting title decider at the 2010 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix, but as you've never heard it before!
Lewis Hamilton Wins First World Title | 2008 Brazilian Grand Prix | Race Highlights https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3pKsxtzfVbQ Title number seven is in the bag for Lewis Hamilton - but the first one was his most dramatic. Relive the incredible final race of the 2008 season with all the best bits from an extraordinary day at Interlagos...
2008 Brazilian Grand Prix Race Edit (Official) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2qfPhvnfSMk What a finale in 2008, here's FOM's official race edit from 2008.
F1 2008 Brazilian Grand Prix Final 3 Laps with Rush Soundtrack https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LBzySdxGPEc Joy. Heartbreak. Pride. Agony. This is Formula 1.
2008 British Grand Prix - Race Highlights https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iSJBbNX4zEo A home hero on the warpath and chaotic weather. Check out the best bits from a rain-soaked 2008 British Grand Prix!
